pages.text: Along with your weapons ability, your mobility has been expanded.$(br2)Press $(2)'ALT'$() while moving in any direction to perform a dodge.$(br2)Hold $(2)'SHIFT'$() while running to break into a sprint that actively consumes stamina.

There are many other parkour options available as well, for example, press $(2)'C'$() while running to slide or while walking to prone.$(br2)The best way to learn how to use these parkour options as well as discover new ones is to experiment.$(br2)The heavier the armor you wear, the less agile you will find yourself.
